doc.title: High Society
doc.plot: Jared is the leader of a small crew of young drug dealers in a small city. Trying to figure out what he wants to do with his life when he gets out of the business (if he ever gets out), his relationship with his girlfriend begins to break down and he becomes wary of who he can trust within his circle. A mysterious man shows up in town and starts ambushing drug deals, stealing money, drugs and cell phones in the process. When Jared's best friend, Devon, gets severely stabbed by this man, Jared decides to stop his current deals and help his friend. When they both disappear along with the money and drugs from the previously ambushed deals,Charlie, the head of the drug industry, begins to question Jared and Devon's loyalty.
